languages.text: "Вынуждена отказаться. Маршал Грегорас Стракс, я обвиняю вас в предательстве Империума и пособничестве еретику! Клыки Простора, к бою!"
"I must refuse. Marshal Gregoras Strachs, I charge you with treason against the Imperium and conspiring with a heretic! Fangs of the Expanse, to battle!"
languages.original_text: "Вынуждена отказаться. Маршал Грегорас Стракс, я обвиняю вас в предательстве Империума и пособничестве еретику! Клыки Простора, к бою!"

traits.locale_text: "I must refuse. Marshal Gregoras Strachs, I charge you with treason against the Imperium and conspiring with a heretic! Fangs of the Expanse, to battle!"
"I must refuse. Marshal Gregoras Strachs, I charge you with treason against the Imperium and conspiring with a heretic! Fangs of the Expanse, to battle!"
"I must refuse. Marshal Gregoras Strachs, I charge you with treason against the Imperium and conspiring with a heretic! Fangs of the Expanse, to battle!"
"I must refuse. Marshal Gregoras Strachs, I charge you with treason against the Imperium and conspiring with a heretic! Fangs of the Expanse, to battle!"
"I must refuse. Marshal Gregoras Strachs, I charge you with treason against the Imperium and conspiring with a heretic! Fangs of the Expanse, to battle!"

languages.text: "Abgelehnt. Marschall Gregoras Strachs, ich klage Euch des Verrats am Imperium und der Konspiration mit einer Ketzerin an! Fänge der Ausdehnung, kämpft!"
languages.original_text: "I must refuse. Marshal Gregoras Strachs, I charge you with treason against the Imperium and conspiring with a heretic! Fangs of the Expanse, to battle!"

traits.locale_text: "Abgelehnt. Marschall Gregoras Strachs, ich klage Euch des Verrats am Imperium und der Konspiration mit einer Ketzerin an! Fänge der Ausdehnung, kämpft!"

languages.text: « Je me vois dans l'obligation de refuser. Maréchal Gregoras Strachs, je vous accuse de trahison envers l'Imperium et de conspiration avec une hérétique ! Crocs des Étendues, aux armes ! »
languages.original_text: "I must refuse. Marshal Gregoras Strachs, I charge you with treason against the Imperium and conspiring with a heretic! Fangs of the Expanse, to battle!"

traits.locale_text: « Je me vois dans l'obligation de refuser. Maréchal Gregoras Strachs, je vous accuse de trahison envers l'Imperium et de conspiration avec une hérétique ! Crocs des Étendues, aux armes ! »

languages.text: “请容我拒绝。格雷戈拉斯·斯塔克斯元帅，我在此指控你背叛帝国，与异端分子同流合污！扩区之牙，准备战斗！”
languages.original_text: "I must refuse. Marshal Gregoras Strachs, I charge you with treason against the Imperium and conspiring with a heretic! Fangs of the Expanse, to battle!"

traits.locale_text: “请容我拒绝。格雷戈拉斯·斯塔克斯元帅，我在此指控你背叛帝国，与异端分子同流合污！扩区之牙，准备战斗！”

languages.text: «Debo negarme. ¡Mariscal Gregoras Strachs, le acuso de traición contra el Imperium y de conspirar con una hereje! ¡Colmillos de la Extensión, a la batalla!».
languages.original_text: "I must refuse. Marshal Gregoras Strachs, I charge you with treason against the Imperium and conspiring with a heretic! Fangs of the Expanse, to battle!"

traits.locale_text: «Debo negarme. ¡Mariscal Gregoras Strachs, le acuso de traición contra el Imperium y de conspirar con una hereje! ¡Colmillos de la Extensión, a la batalla!».

languages.text: 「拒否する。グレゴラス・ストラッチス将帥、私は君を帝国に対する反逆罪と異端者との共謀罪で告発する！エクスパンスの牙、戦闘開始！」
languages.original_text: "I must refuse. Marshal Gregoras Strachs, I charge you with treason against the Imperium and conspiring with a heretic! Fangs of the Expanse, to battle!"

traits.locale_text: 「拒否する。グレゴラス・ストラッチス将帥、私は君を帝国に対する反逆罪と異端者との共謀罪で告発する！エクスパンスの牙、戦闘開始！」

languages.text: "Reddediyorum. Miralay Gregoras Strachs, asıl ben seni İmparatorluk'a ihanetten ve bir kâfirle iş birliğinden suçlu buluyorum! Enginlik'in Dişleri, savaşa!"
languages.original_text: "I must refuse. Marshal Gregoras Strachs, I charge you with treason against the Imperium and conspiring with a heretic! Fangs of the Expanse, to battle!"

traits.locale_text: "Reddediyorum. Miralay Gregoras Strachs, asıl ben seni İmparatorluk'a ihanetten ve kâfirle iş birliğinen suçlu buluyorum! Enginlik'in Dişleri, savaşa!"
